turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a coffee in Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, on what store is it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: In Lincoln center.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You mean, 121 Lincoln Center, Stockton?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok got it, what kind of coffee would like to have?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, I'm thinking about, Iced Black and White Mocha

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, is that Iced Black and White Mocha?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size is it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande,

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Grande, got it, what kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Almond milk in it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, whipped or not whipped cream in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: whipped cream on it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: done, what else do you want to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think that's it, what time is it going to be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Done, Iced Black and White Mocha is ready for pickup in about 5 minutes in 121 Lincoln Center in Stockton.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, thank you for using google home assistant.
